tgt_original: mṛdvī madhyādhimātrā ca kṣāntiryathākramameva satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntāvityanenānyeṣāmāryamārge prathamaphalādau buddhatve ca niyoktukāmatāmupādāyoktam
madhyaṃ hitādicittatrayeṇāyatyāṃ parahitāśayatāmupādāya |  adhimātraṃ mātrādicittotpādena tadātve cāyatyāñca pareṣāmiṣṭopasaṃhārakāmatāmupādāya nirdiṣṭam |

mṛdumadhyādhimātrāstvagradharmā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pareṣāmaviśeṣeṇa yānatraye paripācanāya viśeṣeṇa bodhisattvamārge niyojanāya sarvasampatprakarṣaniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānakāmatāmupādāya sattvaparipācanānāvaraṇarūpasaddharmasthitivacanenoktāḥ |
yathādhimātrā kṣāntireva kṣaṇikī tathāgradharmāḥ | iti |  tat svārthādhikārāt |
pratyarthikopalambhe ca vikalpo grāhako'paraḥ ||16 || iti  syādgrāhyavikalpo na grāhakavikalpa iti |  catuṣkoṭikam |
syāt gotrameva na gotravikalpa iti paścātpādakaḥ |  yastāvadgotravikalpo gotramapi tat tadyathā pratipakṣasamudāgamakāle gotram |

tyantamātsaryadharmatayā pratyarthikamārādivastūpalambhe ca tāttvikabhāvābhiniveśena prajñaptisannevātmā grāhakaḥ pravartata ityevamāryāṇāṃ sambandhī dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgacittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ praheyastatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhenokto bhavati |
